<small>Aramaic form: [[H7265]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָגַז‎</span> **verb** ==be agitated, quiver, quake, be excited, perturbed== (Phoenician Iph. (+ Infinitive absolute Qal) ***disquiet, disturb***, Inscription Tabn.<sup>4.6.7</sup>; Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***provoke to wrath***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***tremble*** (with rage, fear, [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]); V, VIII, ***rumble*** (of thunder, [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a trembling disease*** (of camels), etc.; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְגַו‎</span> ***tremble, rage***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be enraged***; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגז‎</span> ***wrath***, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>367</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָגַז‎</span> [[Prov.29.9|Prov 29:9]], 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽגְזָה‎</span> [[Isa.14.9|Isa 14:9]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְגַּז‎</span> [[2Sam.7.10|2Sam 7:10]]; [[1Chr.17.9|1Chr 17:9]], 2 feminine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּרְגְּוִי‎</span> [[Ezek.16.43|Ezek 16:43]] (but see below); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְגְּזוּן‎</span> [[Hab.3.7|Hab 3:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְגָּז֑וּן‎</span> [[Exod.15.14|Exod 15:14]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְגָ֫זָה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:48i»§ 48i</sup>) [[Isa.32.1|Isa 32:1]]l, masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִגְזוּ‎</span> [[Ps.4.5|Ps 4:5]] — ***quake***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[1Sam.14.15|1Sam 14:15]]; [[Amos.8.8|Amos 8:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing), [[Ps.77.19|Ps 77:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעַשׁ‎</span>), [[Joel.2.10|Joel 2:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> of locusts; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רלשׁ‎</span>), [[Prov.30.21|Prov 30:21]](<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span> person); subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺסְדֵי הָרִים‎</span> [[Ps.18.8|Ps 18:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעשׁ‎</span>), = [[2Sam.22.8|2Sam 22:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺסְדוֺת הַשָׁמַיִם‎</span>; \|\| ***id.***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶהָרִים‎</span> [[Isa.5.25|Isa 5:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהֹמוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.77.17|Ps 77:17]] of tent-curtains [[Hab.3.7|Hab 3:7]] (figurative of terror of tent-dwellers); of people, in dread, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> person [[Deut.2.25|Deut 2:25]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּל‎</span>), [[Isa.64.1|Isa 64:1]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing [[Jer.33.9|Jer 33:9]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּחַד‎</span>); absolute, [[Exod.15.14|Exod 15:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִיל אָחַז וגו‎</span>), [[Ps.99.1|Ps 99:1]]; [[Joel.2.1|Joel 2:1]] pregnantly = ***come quivering*** [[Mic.7.17|Mic 7:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local); of person, in fear, awe, [[Gen.45.24|Gen 45:24]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location), [[Isa.32.11|Isa 32:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרַד‎</span>), v[[Isa.32.10|Isa 32:10]]; [[Ps.4.5|Ps 4:5]]; [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתַּי‎</span>), compare of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּטְנִי‎</span> [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]] of Israel, = ***be disquieted***, [[2Sam.7.10|2Sam 7:10]] = [[1Chr.17.9|1Chr 17:9]] ***be excited, perturbed***, of person [[2Sam.19.1|2Sam 19:1]] (by grief; compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאוֺל‎</span> [[Isa.14.9|Isa 14:9]] (surprise; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person); in rage, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>, ***at***, [[Ezek.16.43|Ezek 16:43]] (of Jerusalem personified; but read **Hiph\`il** (i.e. ***didst enrage me***) [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]); probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׂחַק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְר‎</span> [[Prov.29.9|Prov 29:9]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.28.2|Isa 28:2]]l. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְגִּיז‎</span> [[Isa.23.11|Isa 23:11]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְגַּזְחַנִי‎</span> [[1Sam.28.15|1Sam 28:15]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארְגִּיו‎</span> [[Isa.13.13|Isa 13:13]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְגִּיז‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53l»§ 53l</sup>) [[Jer.50.34|Jer 50:34]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְגִּיז‎</span> [[Isa.14.16|Isa 14:16]]; [[Job.9.6|Job 9:6]], plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְגִּיזֵי‎</span> [[Job.12.6|Job 12:6]] — ***cause to quake, disquiet, enrage: cause*** earth ***to quake*** [[Isa.14.16|Isa 14:16]] (figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעשׁ‎</span>), [[Job.9.6|Job 9:6]] ***shake earth*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמְּקוֺמָהּ‎</span>; heavens [[Isa.13.13|Isa 13:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעשׁ‎</span>); kingdoms [[Isa.23.11|Isa 23:11]] ***cause disquiet***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, [[Jer.50.34|Jer 50:34]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגע‎</span>); = disturb [[1Sam.28.15|1Sam 28:15]] (compare Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תרגזן‎</span>, Inscription Tabn.<sup>4</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>sm xxviii</sup>);= enrage, provoke, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְגִּיזֵי אֵל‎</span> [[Job.12.6|Job 12:6]] so also probably [[Ezek.16.43|Ezek 16:43]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְגִּזִי לִי‎</span>), see **Qal** ***near the end*** **Hithpa\`el** ***excite oneself***, only ***Infinitiveconstruct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלי הִתְרַגֶּזְךָ‎</span> ***thine exciting thyself*** (to rage) against me, [[2Kgs.19.27|2Kgs 19:27]]; [[2Kgs.19.26|2Kgs 19:26]] = [[Isa.37.28|Isa 37:28]]; [[Isa.37.29|Isa 37:29]].
